title: What causes an economic recession? - Richard Coffin

multiple-choice.question: What was the primary material used by the people of Britain for tools, jewelry, and currency before 800 BCE?

options.label: C
options.text: A negative disruption to the balance between supply and demand

options.label: A

options.text: They are more likely to invest in projects

options.label: B
